fulltext:
NGUYEN AN
HR PASSIONATE
CONTACTS
Ho Chi Minh 
WEBSITES & 
SOCIAL LINKS

Linked In:
EDUCATION

University, Ho Chi Minh
2015
SKILLS
Boolean Search
Talent Mapping
Time Management
Recruiting
Talent Development
Recruitment Marketing
A DAY OF MY 
LIFE
- Stay healthy by running
- Explore my career at Company
- Spend time with Family & 
relaxing 
- Keep my knowledge updated
ABOUT ME
Driven Talent Selecting and Development with 5 years of experience in
HR. An inspiring and trusted teammate, with a strong field in talent
mapping, sourcing, consulting and a solid reputation for assessing
manpower needs, increasing qualification of employees and driving
stakeholders satisfaction.
LIFE PHILOSOPHY
"Don't judge a book by its cover, 'til you read to end"
WORK EXPERIENCE
Talent Acquisition Specialist, OYO Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh
Jun 2019 - Apr 2020
- Achieve 85% Hiring project for Business Department
- Recruit core members for Revenue function Business Analyst)
- Expand double Operations team size
- Deal and consult with different type of stake holder
- Talent mapping to develop employees career and build up talent pool 
- Manage communications between applicants, hiring managers and others to keep 
all parties updated of the status of each candidate
- Coach other recruiters to quickly help them catch up with the assigned target
- Outstanding performance in November
Talent Acquisition Specialist, Go-Viet , Ho chi Minh
Nov 2018 - Jun 2019
- In-charge hiring for Go-Food project
HRBP, Foody, Ho Chi Minh
May 2017 - Nov 2018
- Achieve reward in June, 2017
- Creating comprehensive Job Description and writing advertisement to post on job 
boards
- Developing the recruitment process to be more innovative and cost effective
- Being in-charge of the recruitment for all employee levels
- Posting Job Advertisement in appropriate sources
- Maintaining and creating posts for Foody Jobs fan-page on Facebook.
HR Specialist, MD24 House Call, Ho Chi Minh
Apr 2016 - Apr 2017
- Outstanding Performance and Dedication in July, 2016 
- Employee of the Year 2016
Admin Staff, Aeon Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh
Nov 2014 - Apr 2016
